snippet.title: Omikron The Nomad Soul Gameplay -  Windows PC [1080p HD]
snippet.description:
Welcome to HDBacon Retro Gaming's first gameplay video ever!

I absolutely love this game! So I thought I'd make a really long gameplay of it that shows most of what you can do/happens in the game! I loved this game so much. It was way ahead of its time and I can only hope its not one of them games (though I think it might be) that was created very well way ahead of its time yet little people know of it.

It was more or less the only reason why I brought a new cheap old PC just so I could play this and was really hoping I could record this, and I guess I went a bit too far for how long it goes for and the size wow! biggest video both in time and size!

I show pretty much everything you can do such as, swimming, fighting hand to hand combat, shooting, puzzles and finding out information that leads to an answer for a puzzle.

I might upload some more Omikron The Nomad Soul videos such as The fighting tournaments, different shop owners, the TV channels, what happens when you lose a fight to a certain demon, David Bowie concerts etc.

Created by: Quantic Dream (these guys also created Fahrenheit/Indigo Prophecies and Heavy Rain)

Published by: Eidos Interactive Limited in 1999

Sadly I had misread what YT said, uploaded it and said it went over 15 minutes T_T
So I can now upload videos that go over 15 mins (upto 12 hours!), but sadly that didnt mean it would make the already uploaded video ready to be watched!

So please enjoy (dont expect you to watch the whole thing) but yeah.
